column2: "Na afei
column3: enuanom
column4: merema hom ehu asɛmpa no a mekaa kyerɛɛ hom
column8: "ɔnam do so na hom nya nkwa
column9: sɛ hom suo asɛmpa no ara mekaa kyerɛɛ hom no mu dzen a

column2: "Na nsɛm a odzi kan a mo so minyae a medze hyɛɛ hom nsa nye dɛ hɛn bɔn ntsi na Kraest wui dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwnsɛm no se;"
"na dɛ wosiee no
column3: na ne ndaansa no wonyaan no dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwnsɛm no se;"

column2: "na dɛ oyii noho kyerɛɛ Siifas
column3: na nkyii oyii noho kyerɛɛ duebien no;"

column2: "na nkyii oyii noho kyerɛɛ enuanom bɔbor ahaenum prɛko a hɔn mu piinara tsetse hɔ sesei
column3: na binom adeda;"

column2: "na nkyii oyii noho kyerɛɛ James; na nkyii oyii noho kyerɛɛ asomafo no nyina;"
"na hɔn nyinara ekyir
column3: na oyii noho kyerɛɛ mo so a metse dɛ obi a wɔwo no ber a ɔnnsoe mu."

column2: "Na emi nye asomafo no mu ekumaba a mennsɛ dɛ wɔfrɛ me ɔsomafo mpo
column3: osiandɛ mihiahiaa Nyankopɔn asɔr ho."

column2: "Naaso ɔnam Nyankopɔn adom do na metse dɛ mbrɛ metse yi
column3: na n’adom a ɔdze doom me no annyɛ gyan: na mbom mayɛ edwuma pii asen hɔn nyina
column5: na mbom Nyankopɔn adom a ɔnye me nam no a."

column2: "Ntsi sɛ emi o
column3: hɔn o
column4: dza yɛpaa mu ka nye yi
column5: na dza hom gyee dzii nye yi."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔka no Kraest ho dɛ oenyan efi ewufo mu a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom mu binom ka dɛ ewufosoɛr bi nnyi?"

column2: "Na sɛ ewufosoɛr bi nnyi hɔ a
column3: nna Kraest so nnyanee:"

column2: "na sɛ Kraest nnyanee a
column3: nna hɛn asɛnka yɛ gyan
column4: na hom gyedzi so yɛ gyan."

column2: "Nyew
column3: nna wobohu hɛn so dɛ yɛgye dasewia ma Nyankopɔn
column4: osiandɛ yedzi Nyankopɔn dase dɛ oenyan Kraest
column5: na sɛ ewufo nnyan dze a

column2: "Na sɛ ewufo nnyan a
column3: nna Kraest so nnyanee;"

column2: "na sɛ Kraest nnyanee so a
column3: nna hom gyedzi yɛ kwa
column4: hom da ho wɔ hom bɔn mu."

column2: "Nna eso hɔn a wɔadeda wɔ Kraest mu no ahera."
"Sɛ nkwa yi mu nko na yeenya enyidado wɔ Kraest mu a
column3: nna nyimpa nyina mu abɔbɔfo nye hɛn."

column2: "Na afei Kraest enyan efi ewufo mu ayɛ hɔn a wɔadeda mu eduaba kan."
"Na mbrɛ owu nam nyimpa do bae no
column3: nyimpa na ewufosoɛr so nam no do bae."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nyina wu wɔ Adam mu no
column3: dɛmara so na hɔn nyina benya nkwa wɔ Kraest mu."

column2: "Na obiara wɔ nankasa ne kyɛpɛn do: Kraest nye eduaba kan
column3: na nkyii hɔn a wɔyɛ Kraest dze

column2: "Nna nkyii ewiei no reba a ɔdze ahendzi no bɛhyɛ Nyankopɔn nye Egya no nsa
column3: ber a ɔama mpanyindzi nye tumdzi nye ahoɔdzen nyina ayɛ kwa."

column2: "Na otwar dɛ odzi hen kodu dɛ ɔdze n’atamfo nyina bogu n’ananadze."
"Na ɔtamfo a odzi ekyir a ɔbɛma ɔayɛ kwa
column3: nye owu."

column2: "Na ɔdze adze nyina egu n’ananadze. Na sɛ ɔka dɛ ɔdze adze nyina egu n’ananadze a
column3: no mu da hɔ pefee dɛ nyia ɔdze adze nyina guu n’ananadze no nnka ho bi."

column2: "Na sɛ onya dze ndzɛmba nyina gu n’ananadze a
column3: nna Ɔba no nankasa so dze noho bɛhyɛ nyia ɔdze adze nyina guu n’ananadze no n’ase
column4: na Nyankopɔn aayɛ adze nyina mu adze nyina."

column2: "Ɔnntse dɛm a
column3: hɔn a wonuma hɔn ma ewufo no
column4: wɔbɛyɛ dɛn? Sɛ ewufo nnyan koraa a
column5: ɔyɛ dɛn na wonuma hɔn ma ewufo?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na hɛn so yɛdze hɛn ho to amandze mu dɔnhwer nyina yi?"
"Enuanom
column3: meka hom ho ahohyehyɛ a mowɔ wɔ hɛn Ewuradze Kraest Jesus mu dɛ muwu daa."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa afamu nko na menye mbowa koe wɔ Efeso a
column3: ɔyɛ me ebɛn mfaso? Na sɛ ewufo nnyan a

column2: "Mma wɔnndaadaa hom: fɛkuw bɔn sɛɛ ɔbra pa."
"Hom mma hom enyi nda hɔ tsenenee mu
column3: na mma hom nnyɛ bɔn; na binom nnyi Nyankopɔn ho nyimdzee: meka yi dze hyɛ hom enyito."

column2: "Na bi a obi bɛse dɛ
column3: Ewufo dua dɛn nyan? Na nyimpadua so bɛn na wɔdze bɛba?"

column2: "Ɔkwasea
column3: dza idua no nnya nkwa
column6: "na dza idua no nnyɛ dua a ɔbɛba no na idua
column8: bi a ewifua anaa nkaa no mu bi a;"

column2: "na Nyankopɔn na ɔma no dua kor a ɔpɛ
column3: na ɔma aba biara nankasa no dua."

column2: "Nnyɛ nam nyina na ɔyɛ nam kor: ɔsor nyimpa nam
column3: ɔsor mbowa dze

column2: "Sor abɔdze so wɔ hɔ
column3: na famu abɔdze wɔ hɔ: na ɔsor sor dze no n’enyimnyam
column4: na ɔsor famu dze no nedze."

column2: "Ewia enyimnyam nko
column3: bosoom dze nko
column4: nworaba dze nko: na ɔsosor nworaba enyimnyam nkorkor."

column2: "Mbrɛ ewufo mu soɛr so tse nye no. Wodua no prɔwee mu: wonyan no dza ɔmmprɔw mu;"
"wodua no enyimguase mu: wonyan no enyimnyam mu; wodua no mberɛw mu: wonyan no ahoɔdzen mu;"
"wodua no ɔkra nyimpadua: wonyan no sunsum nyimpadua. Sɛ ɔkra nyimpadua wɔ hɔ a
column3: nna sunsum dze so wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Dɛmara so na wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column3: Adam a odzi kan no bɛyɛɛ ɔkra tseasefo: na Adam a odzi ekyir no bɛyɛɛ sunsum a ɔma nkwa."

column2: "Naaso nnyɛ sunsum dze no na odzi kan
column3: na mbom ɔkra dze no a
column4: na nkyii sunsum dze no reba."

column2: "Nyimpa a odzi kan no fi famu yɛ famunyi: nyimpa a otsia ebien no fi sor."
"Mbrɛ famunyi no tse
column3: mbrɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ famufo so tse nye no: na mbrɛ ɔsornyi no tse no
column4: mbrɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ ɔsorfo tse nye no."

column2: "Na mbrɛ yɛahyɛ famunyi no suban no
column3: mbrɛ yɛbɛhyɛ ɔsornyi no so suban nye no."

column2: "Enuanom
column3: dza meka nye dɛ honam nye bɔgya runntum nnya Nyankopɔn ahenman no; na eso dza ɔprɔw rinnya dza ɔmmprɔw no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: mereka hom esumasɛm: nnyɛ hɛn nyina na yɛbɛdeda

column2: "amonmu ara
column3: ntsɛmara
column4: wɔ ekyir abɛntoa no mu: na wɔbɛhɛn abɛntoa no
column5: na ewufo no benyan dɛ wɔmmprɔw da

column2: "Na dza ɔprɔw yi otwar dɛ ɔhyɛ dza ɔmmprɔw
column3: na dza owu yi otwar dɛ ɔhyɛ dza onnwu."

column2: "Na sɛ dza ɔprɔw yi nya hyɛ dza ɔmmprɔw
column3: na dza owu yi nya hyɛ dza onnwu a
column4: nna asɛm a wɔakyerɛw no bɛba mu dɛ

column2: "Owu
column3: wo konyim wɔ hen? Owu

column2: "Owu hwirom nye bɔn
column3: na bɔn tum nye mbra no:"

column2: "na ndaase nka Nyankopɔn a ɔnam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest do ma hɛn konyimdzi."
"Dɛm ntsi
column3: mo nuanom adɔfo
column6: hom mbor do wɔ Ewuradze edwuma mu daa
column7: osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ hom berɛ nnkɛyɛ gyan wɔ Ewuradze mu."
